nodes.title: Understand the basics of databases
nodes.desc: Learn fundamental database concepts like schemas, data models, and querying. [w3schools](https://www.w3schools.com/sql/)

nodes.title: Learn about NoSQL databases
nodes.desc: Grasp the characteristics and advantages of NoSQL databases over traditional relational databases. [mongodb](https://www.mongodb.com/nosql)

nodes.title: Explore advanced features
nodes.desc: Dive deeper into topics like sharding, replication, and geospatial indexing. [mongodb](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/reference/features/)

nodes.title: Practice with real-world projects
nodes.desc: Apply your MongoDB skills to build practical applications and solve real-world problems. [mongodb](https://www.mongodb.com/developer/tutorials/)

nodes.title: Join the MongoDB community
nodes.desc: Connect with other MongoDB users and developers through forums, meetups, and online communities. [mongodb](https://www.mongodb.com/community)

nodes.title: Explore MongoDB's document model
nodes.desc: Understand how data is structured in MongoDB using JSON-like documents. [mongodb](https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/core/document/)

nodes.title: Install MongoDB and set up a local environment
nodes.desc: Download and install MongoDB on your system to practice hands-on. [mongodb](https://www.mongodb.com/try/download/community)

nodes.title: Connect to MongoDB using a driver
nodes.desc: Learn how to interact with MongoDB using drivers like MongoDB Compass or the official MongoDB driver for your preferred programming language. [mongodb](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/drivers/)

nodes.title: Learn basic MongoDB commands
nodes.desc: Master essential commands for creating databases, collections, inserting, updating, deleting, and querying data. [mongodb](https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/reference/command/)

nodes.title: Understand indexing in MongoDB
nodes.desc: Learn how to create indexes to optimize query performance. [mongodb](https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/core/index-types/)

nodes.title: Work with aggregations
nodes.desc: Explore MongoDB's aggregation framework for performing complex data analysis and transformations. [mongodb](https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/reference/operator/aggregation/)

nodes.title: Implement data validation
nodes.desc: Learn how to enforce data integrity using validation rules. [mongodb](https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/tutorial/validate-data-with-validation-rules/)

nodes.title: Learn about MongoDB security
nodes.desc: Understand how to secure your MongoDB deployments and protect sensitive data. [mongodb](https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/security/)
